snippet.title: X-Plane Mobile—Now with Global Scenery
snippet.description:
Now available in X-Plane for iPhone, iPad, & Android: Global scenery!

Explore the globe with more than 37,000 airports, over 11,500 of which feature 3D objects like terminals, towers, hangars, & more.

Also new in this update:
- A gorgeous new lighting model
- Improved flight model physics (taking the latest advances from our desktop simulator)
- Continual passage of time, so you can take off before sunrise and fly until the night
